tool_description: First API to create race chart
name: Race Chart API
title: Race Chart API

api_list.name: Create Racechart
api_list.description: This endpoint allow you to create race charts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://race-chart-api.p.rapidapi.com/create"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "race-chart-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://race-chart-api.p.rapidapi.com/create"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "race-chart-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
